name: 2024 10th International Conference on Environmental Systems Research
content: Papers submitted to ICESR 2024 will be reviewed by both conference committess and IJESD editorial team, accepted papers will be published into regular issues of International Journal of Environmental Science and Development directly. It is mandatory that at least one author registers and presents for every paper that is included in the journal. The journal will be indexed by Scopus, Chemical Abstracts Services (CAS), CABI, DOAJ, Ulrich Periodicals Directory, Crossref, ProQuest, etc.
